question: Which sportsperson has clinched India's first men's triple jump gold in 48 years at the 18th Asian Games 2018?
explanation: Arpinder Singh from Punjab clinched India\'s first men\'s triple jump gold in 48 years, with a jump of 16.77m in the 2018 Jakarta Asian Games on August  29. With this, he became the 2nd Indian sportsperson to achieve this landmark. Before him, Mohinder Singh Gill won gold medal in triple jump event in 1970 Bangkok Asian games event.
